results.title: Microsoft Revenue 2011-2025 | MSFT - Macrotrends
results.content: * Microsoft annual revenue for 2025 was **$281.724B**, a **14.93% increase** from 2024. * Microsoft annual revenue for 2024 was **$245.122B**, a **15.67% increase** from 2023. * Microsoft annual revenue for 2023 was **$211.915B**, a **6.88% increase** from 2022. | Adobe (ADBE) | United States | $133.420B | 19.04 | | Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) | United States | $82.877B | 56.28 | | CommVault Systems (CVLT) | United States | $5.295B | 57.46 | | Progress Software (PRGS) | United States | $1.719B | 9.02 | | Verint Systems (VRNT) | United States | $1.226B | 16.06 | | NetSol Technologies (NTWK) | United States | $0.036B | 75.25 | | Smith Micro Software (SMSI) | United States | $0.013B | 0.00 |

results.title: FY24 Q4 - Segment Revenue and Operating Income - Microsoft
results.content: # Earnings Release FY24 Q4 ## Segment Revenue and Operating Income *IMPORTANT NOTICE TO USERS (summary only, click here Â for full text of notice);*All information is unaudited unless otherwise noted or accompanied by an audit opinion and is subject to the more comprehensive information contained in our SEC reports and filings. All information speaks as of the last fiscal quarter or year for which we have filed a Form 10-K or 10-Q, or for historical information the date or period expressly indicated in or with such information. ### Download Earnings Related Files Information contained in these documents is current as of the earnings date, and not restated for new accounting standards #### Earnings Release Pages #### Related Information
